Calls sudo forever stop to stop node process
Build and execute acme-client to retrieve cert, key & ca from letsencrypt. This will allow encrypted and ca verified https communication.

. 
Only challenge type 'http-01' is implemented.

c.email must be your valid email
c.commitment must be either staging (to not apply changes) or production (to apply changes)

This component will communicate with Let's Encrypt API and create  -> delete a 'challenge' file in the static folder.
Ensure this server has http port 80 open and publicly reachable via  <%a.hostName%>  and not redirecting when building. 
3 files are generated;
/home/%a.systemUser%/.ssl/%a.hostName%.key  
/home/%a.systemUser%/.ssl/%a.hostName%.cert
/home/%a.systemUser%/.ssl/%a.hostName%.csr 

After the files are generated you can enable https and redirect http to https. Restart any other servers that depend on these certs.

6b1f3ef4-fe59-41ff-bd25-e1f196f6c6ad.name: Mount S3 bucket on amazon-linux EC2 instance

ops.insert: Installs s3fs-fuse on aws linux and mounts S3 bucket.

Ensure the S3 role has been applied to this instance.
See;
: The name of the s3 access role you created in AWS iam.
: The url corresponding to the region of the bucket.
: The folder to place the s3 file system.
: The name of your bucket you created in s3

text.value: Design, develop and deploy custom web applications, easily

insertHTML.value: A low code tool to build rich web environments for your self or for others. Design complex self-hosted web apps using an intuitive & fun UI. No experience required.

css.value: text-align: center;       margin-top: auto;    margin-bottom: auto;

insertHTML.value: Design and manage your web infrastructure and applications in one easy to use tool. ezStack Builder connects to other servers and automatically configures all the tricky bits so that web development can be easy. You can start being creative immediately.
The easiest way to manage your on-line presence and develop custom applications independently. Plug and play with the coolest technologies on your personal web server.

css.value: display: flex;    align-items: center;    align-content: center;    justify-content: center;     flex-wrap: wrap;

insertHTML.value: Freedom to build anything and share. Freedom from lock-in and restrictions. Freedom to choose the technologies and the look that you want. You are the boss.

• Your servers are private and secure and only you have the admin credentials.
  • You can use ezStack Builder without signing in or signing up.
  • You can build and deploy as many web apps and pages as you want without restrictions.
  • You can export your web designs without restrictions. 
  • You can build and deploy WordPress or Node.js or both.
  • You can insert Node.js services into WordPress pages seamlessly.
  • You can reverse proxy WordPress improving security and continuity.
  • You can manage multiple servers at the same time.
  • You can attach your own domain name.
  • You can drag and drop code and play 'what if' scenarios.
  • You can invent your own APIs.
  • You can build amazing web sites for other people who will very happy with the results.
  • You can learn about web development and you can do all this independently.

text.value: For a limited time ezStack is offering free builder and app hosting for 6 months to an individual that needs a web site and can provide product feedback during that time. Leave your name and contact details in the comment section or an email if you are interested.

insertHTML.value: For the easiest hosting ever, ezStack can host Builder and your web apps for you and when you decide it's time for independence the transition will be seamless.

insertHTML.value: Do you have your own cloud account? EzStack Builder includes functionality that exposes cloud automation for you to take advantage of.

insertHTML.value: Install ezStack Builder on your own server to maintain complete independence. See our GitHub repository for install instructions.

ops.insert: A place to display link to online demo

insertHTML.value: The online demo will allow you to explore the user interface and participate in an optional interactive tour. The demo server will be live for 15 minutes and after that time the server will be terminated. The demo server is not secured so do not enter any private information into the demo applications. Please let us know what you think of the experience and if you would like an extended demo just let us know in the comments page.

A service to provide a tunneling http/s proxy.
Configure your browser to use http & https proxy via this system.
Ensure that this system's firewall only allows your IP to access the listen_port.

Demonstration profile service with mailer contact form. 
Enable Mailer component and set its variables.

serviceEndPointName 	- Default contactSend
authuser 				- Mail service login name. Eg. me@provider.net
authpass 			- Mail service password
mailhost 				- Mail service host name. Eg. mail.provider.net
mailport 				- Default 587
sendTo 				- Mail account to send to. Eg. me@provider.net
sendFrom 			- The from address. Eg. My Profile <me@provider.net>
subject 				- Any text to appear in subject line.
Insert functions into current Node instance.

insertHTML.value: See my LinkedIn profile for more career details.

Regardless of the role, I solve information problems with an analytical touch. I support the business by providing solutions that are open, flexible, appropriate, intuitive and productive. Regardless of whether I was leading IT initiatives for large corporations or being a solo application developer I always put the customer first.
I love to meet people in my home town of Calgary and talk about technology and I'd love to hear what you are doing. Please contact me if you have any questions, opportunities, or comments.

Hi I'm Jan. Nice to meet you! In my 20+ years as an IT professional, I was fortunate to have achievements in almost every segment of the IT world. I have tied together my experiences in programming, support, testing, analysis, and management into a skill-set that can even impress my parents.
• Founder and full stack developer of a Free Open Source Startup. ezStack - A personal configuration manager that was used to easily design, develop and deploy this web site.

• Racked up 23 weeks of great experiences in IBM with wins in product support, software architecture and development, application testing, project support and management, DevOps and automation, plus many other roles.
• Worked with and learned from many corporate IT organizations including; IBM, Toys 'R Us, and more.
• Officially recognized for concept and creation of online automated release management information portal for Subway.

• Learning new tech. In IT nothing stands still. New technologies appear everyday. Watching tech news, hearing about other peoples experiences and keeping an open mind will spawn that big idea in the future.
• Very high-level application development. This was one of the reasons I created Random. Anyone can be creative if they have the right tools at their finger tips.
• Configuration management. Automation + SSH + Cloud api = efficient and intuitive systems creation and management. Don't ask IT to build. Ask IT to allow you to build
• Founder, designer and developer of a free open source thing. Allows anyone to design, develop, and deploy web applications.
• Techs in use: Node.js, Express, SSH, HTML5, CSS, AWS API, rest api, headless chrome
• Project support roles: Release management, project coordinator, Project data analyst.
• DevOps: Implemented successful strategies to shorten and strengthen SDLC. Tech Used: Java, Tomcat, DB2, Rational Team Concert. (Can Gov/Subway/Shell)
• Developer of many business specific software products for IBM, Gov, Shell, ATB. Techs in use: JS, Java, Websphere, Lotus, Dojo, perl
• Built example.net to host web profiles for free (like this one) for anyone in the community who needs one.

Service to provide a reverse http proxy.
Uses
- Set to URL of target server to be proxied. Eg 'http://some-server.com:8080' or most likely 'http://127.0.0.1:8080' if wp and node are installed on the same server.
- Set to the request path that will be proxied. Eg '/blog'
- Set to the rewritten path on the proxied server . Eg '/' if WordPress was installed in the root or '/wpblog/' if WordPress was installed in /wpblog

Add proxy settings to wp-config.php.
HTTPS - Set to on or off depending if proxy host is https or not.
HTTP_HOST - Set to IP or host name of proxy host. Eg www.mypage.com
WP_HOME - Set to url and path of proxy root. Eg
- Set to url and path of proxy root. Eg

/wpblog
REQUEST_URI - Set to convert admin url to proxied url. Eg /wpblog/wp-admin/

c.secret = Any long random alpha-numeric string at least 20 chrs.
c.password = The password to log in with. 
c.prefix = This prefix will be pretended to all secure service endpoints. (Should be '/' followed by short random alpha-numeric string. eg: '/aple846').  
ID = Admin

In a demo scenario this folder is here to ensure that utils are installed. Normally building Prime would install these.
Installs utilities that are needed to perform the build process. Ensure this component and all children are build before any projects/apps.

Will npm install a supplied package only if not already found in node_modules .
Login account must have sudo access.
Use -g to install globally.
Usage: npmInstall packagename [-g]

ops.insert:
call createNewJSON.sh file [text to append]
Eg.
createNewJSON.sh /tmp/my.json '{}'
Set wpFolder to folder to install WordPress to.  Eg 'blog'  Use '.' for root.

attributes.link: Hosting a WordPress blog with Amazon Linux

ops.insert: Hosting a WordPress blog with Amazon Linux
For production environments ensure this system is isolated from the internet during setup.
Hosting a WordPress blog with Amazon Linux
Ensure the target server is isolated from the internet during setup.

64d5f3ce-993d-48b5-9161-fb6b68529641.name: Set Maria & httpd to start automatically

ops.insert:
Install Wordpress from wordpress.org
Warning this is a destructive install. Ensure you have a backup if required.

Sets root pw, creates user & pw, secures db, creates wp-config.php.
Warning! The wordpress-user & database will be dropped if they exist.

wordpress-user - The user name for  wordpress functions. Eg wpuser
DatabaseName - The name of the database. Eg wpdatabase
root-password - The user password.
user-password - The root password.

Navigate to WordPress admin and populate launch link.
Note that the launch urls in this component will be incorrect if proxy is enabled for WordPress.
